title: [Gyldemar Forest, Ruins]
description: A trail of trampled grass winds its way among the many ruined stone foundations.  A pile of rubble marks what must have been an outbuilding of some sort.  The lower half of a guard tower remains nearby, the upper half now in pieces inside.

Moonlight illuminates a trail of trampled grass winds its way among the many ruined stone foundations.  A pile of rubble marks what must have been an outbuilding of some sort.  The lower half of a guard tower remains nearby, the upper half now in pieces inside.
